headers.p3p: CP="This is not a P3P policy! See g.co/p3phelp for more info."

issues.message: HSTS header is missing. This header helps prevent MITM attacks.
issues.recommendation: Add the Strict-Transport-Security header with value: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

issues.message: CSP header is missing. This header helps prevent XSS attacks.
issues.recommendation: Add the Content-Security-Policy header with value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https:;

issues.message: X-Content-Type-Options header is missing. This header prevents MIME type sniffing.
issues.recommendation: Add the X-Content-Type-Options header with value: nosniff

issues.message: Referrer-Policy header is missing. This header controls how much referrer information should be included with requests.
issues.recommendation: Add the Referrer-Policy header with value: strict-origin-when-cross-origin

issues.message: Permissions-Policy header is missing. This header helps control which features and APIs can be used in the browser.
issues.recommendation: Add the Permissions-Policy header with value: accelerometer=(), camera=(), geolocation=(), gyroscope=(), magnetometer=(), microphone=(), payment=(), usb=()

issues.message: COOP header is missing. This header prevents window opener attacks.
issues.recommendation: Add the Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header with value: same-origin

issues.message: CORP header is missing. This header prevents cross-origin resource attacks.
issues.recommendation: Add the Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header with value: same-origin

issues.message: COEP header is missing. This header ensures all cross-origin resources are opted into CORS.
issues.recommendation: Add the Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header with value: require-corp

issues.message: X-DNS-Prefetch-Control header is missing. This header controls DNS prefetching.
issues.recommendation: Add the X-DNS-Prefetch-Control header with value: off

issues.message: Clear-Site-Data header could be used for logout endpoints to clear sensitive data.
issues.recommendation: Add the Clear-Site-Data header with value: "cache","cookies","storage"

cookies.name: NID
issues: Cookie should be set with Secure flag
